message.subject: Dynegy vs. Enron: A "Tale of Two Companies"
message.content:
M1.1. Where? [Request-Information: where should Vince meet Paula] Flink1.1 M1.2 I am in a meeting. [Inform: Vince is in a meeting]
M1.3. Vince
M1.4. --------------------------vince kaminski
[Conventional: signature]

message.subject: Dynegy vs. Enron: A "Tale of Two Companies"
message.content:
M2.1. Brian and I will meet you at 5:00 outside 3AC at 5:00
[Inform: time and place where Brian and Paula will meet Vince]
Blink1.1 Sflink2.1

message.subject: Dynegy vs. Enron: A "Tale of Two Companies"
message.content:
M3.1. I may run afew minslate.
[Inform: Vince may be slightly late]
Blink2.1
M3.2. Ninfa's?
[Request-Information: is Vince's restaurant suggestion a good place to go]
Flink3.2
M3.3. --------------------------vince kaminski
[Conventional: signature]

message.subject: Dynegy vs. Enron: A "Tale of Two Companies"
message.content:
M4.1. Where do we go?

Blink2.1
